0:53 You see that? Atlas. Atlas= Bad guys from CoD Advanced Warfare. 
Advanced Warfare= 15 letters (Not Including Space), Atlas= 5 Letters. 15 
divided by 5= 3. CoD has 3 letters for its abbreviation, there was 6 total 
people in "How Bioshock Should Have Ended". CoD= 3, People= 6,  6-3=3. 3, 
Illuminati's triangle has 3 sides. Illuminati predicted CoD Advanced 
Warfare, so Illuminati hacked into Bioshock and made that. Therefore, 
Bioshock is Illuminati confirmed.﻿

comments.author: Adamzki

comments.text:
How I Think Bioshock Should Have Ended:

Bioshock 1:

Jack is pushed away by Fontaine. But Tennabuam settled self destruct to 
Fontaine's building. The little sisters help Jack escape to building. 
Fontaine got trapped in the building. Jack, Tennabuam,
and the little sister watched the building fall down. Fontaine/Atlas
dies premently. Tennabuam thanks Jack for the help if your rescue all 
little sisters. Tennabuam is angry with you if your harvest all little 
sisters. Tennabuam and the little sisters leave Rapture without Jack. 
Tennabuam said he can control rapture now. Jack heads to Ryan's office to 
control Rapture. But he thinks about what he could do. He has a choose to 
leave Rapture, or he could control Rapture. If you leave Rapture even if 
you harvest little sisters or not Tennabuam will be happy with you no 
matter what. If you stay in Rapture, and if you save little sisters 
Tennabuam will still think you are a hero. If you harvest, and stay in 
Rapture, Tennabuam will be angry with you. If you save little sisters, the 
last thing you will see is a little sister smiling with even if you stay in 
Rapture. If you harvest, a little sister will be frowning even if you go 
with Tennabuam.

Bioshock 2:

Subject Delta gets out of the life boat with Eleanor. Even if you kill the 
NPCs Lamb will live. Lamb gets out of the life boat. Delta glares at her. 
She apologizes to him. Delta has a choice to kill her, or spare her. If you 
kill her, Delta will drill her, and Eleanor goes back to land, and leaves 
Delta there cuz she thinks he is a monster. If you spare Lamb, Delta, 
Eleanor, and Lamb will leave and head to land to live. If you harvest 
little sisters you will see a little sister sitting against a wall with 
blood of a spliced that you killed. If you save all little sisters, a 
little sister will be on the floor playing with her teddy bear, and blocks 
with a picture of Delta.

Bioshock Infinite: 

Before Elizabeth drowns Booker, she stops and thinks for a moment. She 
realizes if she goes back the underwater city (Rapture) she will find 
another Comstock that she needs to kill. Booker tells Elizabeth that the 
city is called Rapture. Booker told her to open a tear for Booker back to 
New York. Elizabeth opens a tear Rapture. They both enter their own tears. 
And high pitch note of the harp ends the whole game.

I know these sound like good endings. Bioshock Infinite only has one ending.
﻿
